::Killfest/EndBringer/Firearm/Prowl/Scyther/Kluster/Grimmler/Fliq::

Killfest flies inside Astroblast, EndBringer entering behind him. 
Killfest nods and takes the cube from Motormaster, inserting it into 
Astroblast.

"The Maximals were much more organized than I had thought there. Or 
rather there were much more of them than I anticipated," Killfest 
says, looking out at the battlefield.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl smiles, seeing that the Predacons were leaving. "Good job, 
guys!" he says into his comm to the other Maximals, "Lets head back 
home."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster swears, feeling the shots hit the base. He motions for 
Symphony to follow him and runs out of the base, looking at the 
attackers.

"Don't they every give up?" he says to himself, taking out his 
missile launcher and firing twice at Reflector. He taps his comm, 
allerting Firearm of the attack.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm flies up beside Prowl, relaying the news of the attack on the 
Cybertronian Fire. Prowl nods.

"Lets hurry," he says, "We'll need to get back to earth by ourselves."

The two bots boost off toward earth, nothing to carry them but their 
jetpacks.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther gets in the shuttle, flying to Pinsir and opening the hatch 
for him.

"Get in, we gotta hurry."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing that the battle was almost over, Grimmler and Fliq turn their 
shuttle around, heading back toward the planet.

"If you need any further help, call us again," Grimmler says to Liono 
over the comm as the shuttle flies back toward earth.

climb in,

back to the

> Psuedo: Well, its good that you had friends to keep you company.
> Atma: How have you caused them trouble?
